articles.author: Shalini Gupta
articles.title: Brits blitz takes South Africa home in first T20I - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The South African right-hander stars with a 56-ball 81 as the visitors register a 12-run win in Chennai | Crickit
articles.content: Chandigarh: After being whitewashed in the ODI series 3-0 along with the defeat in the solitary Test, South Africa women recorded their first win on the Indian tour by beating hosts in the first T20I… [+2126 chars]
